title.narrative: Accountable Grant for Secretariat to UK National Commission for UNESCO

description.narrative: This activity (Accountable Grant for Secretariat to UK National Commission for UNESCO) is a component of UK National Commission for UNESCO 2009/10 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £2,334,842. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). The start date is 01-04-2009 and the end date is 30-09-2011.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
